Name: No More Paint
Desc: Unable to obtain Paint from workshop. Each movement generates 1 Paint of the same color as the block instead

Name: Difficult Research
Desc: -1 to the Paint cost to upgrade Exhibition in every round. Resets after upgrade.

Name: Research Ban
Desc: Unable to increase Exhibition Level. At the start of a round, if a Master has reached Lv.6, Exhibition of the corresponding color +1

Name: Special Victory
Desc: Victory condition changed: Obtain a total of 50 Paint

Name: Fatal Virus I
Desc: At round tally, the Master affected by Masterpiece and Burst of Inspiration will gain +1 level

Name: Local Blockade
Desc: Unable to take action in Green blocks. After triggering Master's Time, set Green Master's level to 4

Name: Fatal Virus II
Desc: At round tally, the Master affected will gain +1 level

Name: Novice Stage 1 Limit
Desc: Only Green actions are permitted. Guaranteed to roll 5 in the 2nd round. Only Green Boss Level will increase.

Name: Novice Stage 2 Limit
Desc: Guaranteed to increase Green Boss Level at the end of the 1st round.
